attributes.action: Stop the proposed ban of High Street CBD cannabis products for up to 18 months
attributes.additional_details: Research strongly suggests that the stress and anxiety reducing properties of CBD are responsible for its ability to help lower blood pressure. CBD benefits heart health in several ways, including by reducing blood pressure and preventing heart damage other conditions it is known to treat are Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's,cardiovascular disorders, anxiety, depression, and other maladies. CBD eases inflammation, provide antioxidants, pain relief and so much more.
attributes.background: People rely on CBD to treat the likes of anorexia, emesis, pain, inflammation, multiple sclerosis, Parkinson's disease, Huntington's disease, Alzheimer's disease, epilepsy, glaucoma, schizophrenia, cancer, obesity and many more banning this for 18 months would have a severe effect on these patients.
